#summary Usage instructions

Once you [installed] the macro, you can run it at any moment by selecting it from macros list (ALT+F8 to view it); before starting the macro, you must select the message(s) it will process. You also must create a proper folder on your hard disk before using the macro the first time, and you must be sure that macro properly points to that folder (see [installtion instructions].

You can also [add a button to the toolbar|test] to start the macro at a click of your mouse.
